name: Copper Peptide + PDRN 1.25%
shortDescription: Eco-friendly serum preventing early aging with skin firming peptides.
longDescription: This Copper Peptide + PDRN serum contains advanced skin-repairing technology, combining copper peptides and sodium DNA to reduce fine lines, improve elasticity, and restore skin vitality. Perfect for aging skin types, it provides deep nourishment without harmful chemicals.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Apply 2-3 drops to clean face morning & night.

name: Vitamin C + Niacinamide Serum
shortDescription: Brighten and protect your skin with clinically proven serum.
longDescription: Powerful Vitamin C + Niacinamide Serum designed to even out skin tone, reduce dark spots, and protect against free radical damage. Ideal for dull or uneven skin, it helps boost radiance while maintaining moisture balance.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Apply in the morning after cleansing.

name: Green Tea + Centella Gel
shortDescription: Soothing gel with antioxidant-rich green tea and centella asiatica.
longDescription: This gel calms irritated skin, reduces redness, and provides a fresh glow. Green Tea and Centella Asiatica work together to fight free radicals while delivering long-lasting hydration.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Apply twice daily to cleansed skin.

name: Hyaluronic Acid Mist
shortDescription: Hydrating mist with eco-conscious ingredients.
longDescription: Hydrating facial mist made with plant-based extracts and recyclable packaging. Refreshes and tones skin on-the-go, suitable for all skin types.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Spray 2-3 times after cleansing or anytime.

name: Aloe Vera + Cucumber Face Gel
shortDescription: Soothing gel for skin hydration and calming.
longDescription: This lightweight gel provides instant hydration while soothing redness and irritation with pure Aloe Vera and Cucumber extracts.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Apply evenly over face and neck.

name: Retinol + Peptide Night Cream
shortDescription: Nourishing night cream to fight aging and restore skin.
longDescription: A powerful anti-aging cream with Retinol and Peptides designed to reduce fine lines, smooth wrinkles, and promote healthy cell turnover while you sleep.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Apply nightly on clean face.

name: Aloe Vera Soothing Gel
shortDescription: Natural soothing gel with organic aloe vera for hydration and skin repair.
longDescription: Our Aloe Vera Soothing Gel is crafted with organic aloe vera extract and other plant-based ingredients to calm irritated skin, reduce redness, and provide deep hydration. Ideal for sensitive and dry skin types, it absorbs quickly without a greasy feel.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Apply generously to affected area twice daily.

name: Chamomile & Calendula Face Cream
shortDescription: Gentle face cream enriched with chamomile & calendula for soothing care.
longDescription: This Chamomile & Calendula Face Cream is formulated for sensitive skin, using natural extracts to soothe irritation, restore moisture balance, and improve skin texture. Free from parabens and sulfates, designed for daily use.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Apply to clean skin morning and night.

name: Biodegradable Dish Soap
shortDescription: Gentle eco-friendly dish soap from plant ingredients.
longDescription: Natural surfactants effectively cut through grease, gentle on hands and environment. Free from harsh chemicals, decomposes naturally.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Rub the brush on Soap then use it.

name: Reusable Cleaning Cloths
shortDescription: Durable, eco-friendly cloths for cleaning without waste.
longDescription: Durable cleaning cloths made of recycled materials, washable and reusable multiple times, reducing waste and cost.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Wash and reuse.

name: Plant-Based Laundry Detergent
shortDescription: Eco-friendly detergent with biodegradable formula.
longDescription: Gentle yet effective plant-based detergent that cleans clothes thoroughly without harming the planet. Free of synthetic fragrances and dyes.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Use 30ml per load.

name: Compostable Trash Bags
shortDescription: Durable trash bags made from compostable materials.
longDescription: High-quality compostable trash bags designed to decompose in industrial composting facilities, reducing landfill waste without sacrificing strength.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Use as regular trash bags.

name: Eco-Friendly Multi-Purpose Cleaner
shortDescription: Natural, non-toxic cleaner safe for all surfaces.
longDescription: Powerful yet gentle multi-surface cleaner made from plant-based ingredients, effective on kitchen, bathroom, glass, and more.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Spray and wipe clean.

name: Bamboo Reusable Straws
shortDescription: Sustainable bamboo straws for eco-friendly drinking.
longDescription: Reusable bamboo straws that reduce plastic use and are naturally antimicrobial. Easy to clean and long-lasting.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Wash after each use.

name: Eco-Friendly Floor Cleaner
shortDescription: Natural floor cleaner with plant-based ingredients for a spotless home.
longDescription: Our Eco-Friendly Floor Cleaner uses biodegradable surfactants and essential oils to clean dirt and grime without harmful chemicals. Safe for all floor types, including wood, tiles, and laminate. Leaves a fresh, natural scent.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Dilute 30 ml in 5 liters of water and mop as usual.

name: Reusable Silicone Food Covers
shortDescription: Eco-friendly, reusable silicone covers to replace single-use plastic wrap.
longDescription: Set of silicone food covers designed to create an airtight seal over bowls, plates, and containers. Made from food-grade, BPA-free silicone, these covers help reduce plastic waste and keep food fresh longer.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Cover food containers after use and wash with soap before next use.

name: Organic Baby Wash & Lotion
shortDescription: Gentle, natural lotion for baby's sensitive skin.
longDescription: This Organic Baby Wash & Lotion combo is specially formulated with natural plant extracts to clean and moisturize delicate baby skin without harmful chemicals or fragrances.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Use during bath or after bathing.

name: Biodegradable Diapers
shortDescription: Eco-friendly diapers designed for comfort and sustainability.
longDescription: Biodegradable diapers made from plant-based materials, allowing gentle care for baby's skin while reducing environmental impact. Highly absorbent with breathable layers.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Use as regular diapers.

name: Organic Cotton Baby Wipes
shortDescription: Soft chemical-free wipes made with organic cotton.
longDescription: Gentle baby wipes made of organic cotton and plant-based extracts to clean sensitive baby skin effectively while being biodegradable.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Use to clean baby's skin as needed.

name: Eco Baby Shampoo
shortDescription: Tear-free, plant-based shampoo for babies.
longDescription: Tear-free shampoo formulated using natural plant ingredients. Gentle cleansing for baby’s hair and scalp without toxins or parabens.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Apply small amount, lather and rinse.

name: Natural Baby Powder
shortDescription: Natural powder for soft, dry skin.
longDescription: Organic, chemical-free baby powder that keeps baby’s skin dry and soft. Made from natural plant-based ingredients that absorb moisture without clogging pores.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Apply after bath or as needed.

name: Baby Organic Massage Oil
shortDescription: Natural massage oil for baby skin care.
longDescription: Gentle massage oil made from organic coconut and almond oil to nourish and soften baby's skin. Ideal for daily massage to improve circulation and relax baby.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Massage gently after bath.

name: Natural Baby Moisturizer
shortDescription: Plant-based moisturizer for soft and healthy baby skin.
longDescription: This Natural Baby Moisturizer is made with organic aloe vera, coconut oil, and shea butter to keep your baby's skin hydrated and soft. Free from parabens, sulfates, and synthetic fragrances, suitable for daily use.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Apply gently after bath or as needed.

name: Organic Baby Bottle Cleaner
shortDescription: Eco-friendly cleaner specifically designed for baby bottles and accessories.
longDescription: This Organic Baby Bottle Cleaner uses plant-derived surfactants to clean bottles, nipples, and accessories effectively without leaving any harmful residue. Safe for baby use and reduces plastic waste compared to harsh chemical cleaners.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Use 10 ml per bottle, scrub, and rinse thoroughly.

name: Natural Deodorant
shortDescription: Eco-friendly, aluminum-free deodorant for long-lasting freshness.
longDescription: Natural deodorant formulated without aluminum or parabens. Provides all-day protection using plant extracts that neutralize odor naturally.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Apply under arms as needed.

name: Bamboo Toothbrush
shortDescription: Sustainable bamboo toothbrush with soft bristles.
longDescription: Eco-friendly toothbrush made from sustainably harvested bamboo and biodegradable bristles. Gentle on gums, reduces plastic waste.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Brush twice daily.

name: Refillable Body Wash
shortDescription: Eco-friendly body wash in reusable bottle.
longDescription: Sustainable body wash made with natural ingredients, packaged in a refillable bottle. Mild, non-toxic formula suitable for all skin types.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Use as needed during shower.

name: Zero-Waste Shampoo Bar
shortDescription: Plastic-free shampoo bar with nourishing oils.
longDescription: Eco-friendly shampoo bar made from natural oils and plant extracts. Zero plastic, reduces packaging waste, and suitable for all hair types.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Rub on wet hair, lather, rinse.

name: Organic Lip Balm
shortDescription: Nourishing lip balm made with natural oils.
longDescription: Made from organic beeswax, shea butter, and natural oils, this lip balm provides long-lasting moisture and protection for chapped lips.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Apply as needed.

name: Natural Hand Sanitizer Gel
shortDescription: Plant-based sanitizer for germ protection.
longDescription: Alcohol-free, natural hand sanitizer gel that kills germs while moisturizing hands, with aloe vera and essential oils.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Apply to hands, rub until dry.

name: Plant-Based Hand Cream
shortDescription: Nourishing hand cream made from natural oils for soft, moisturized hands.
longDescription: This Plant-Based Hand Cream contains organic shea butter, coconut oil, and essential oils to provide deep moisture while protecting the skin from dryness and cracking. Perfect for sensitive skin, and plastic-free packaging.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Apply to hands and massage until fully absorbed.

name: Organic Coconut Body Lotion
shortDescription: Moisturizing body lotion made from organic coconut oil.
longDescription: A deeply nourishing body lotion formulated with organic coconut oil and natural plant extracts. Provides long-lasting hydration, softens skin, and protects it from dryness, all while being free from parabens and synthetic fragrances.

specifications.Usage Instructions: Apply generously over body and massage until absorbed.
